segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01
segments.text: Hello everyone, welcome to our team meeting today.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_02
segments.text: Thanks for having us. I'm excited to discuss the new project.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01
segments.text: Great! Let's start with the agenda. First, we need to review the quarterly results.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_03
segments.text: I have the numbers ready. Our Q3 performance exceeded expectations by 15%.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_02
segments.text: That's fantastic news! What were the key drivers behind this success?

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_03
segments.text: The main factors were increased customer retention and our new product launch. The marketing campaign really paid off.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01
segments.text: Excellent work everyone. Let's move on to the next topic - the upcoming product release.
